author: alexparvulescu
msg: OAK-3057 Simplify debugging conflict related errors

author: desruisseaux
msg: Include the identifier codes in the WKT of CompoundCRS elements.
This is a small departure from ISO 19162 recommendation, but still allowed.
The reason is that we often need to decompose a CompoundCRS back to its original components,

author: jpountz
msg: LUCENE-6645: Optimized DocIdSet building for the "many small postings lists" case.

author: coheigea
msg: Some changes to make it easier to pick up XMLSec 2.0.5

author: kwall
msg: QPID-6613: [Java Broker] Stop explicitly controlling the Logback context lifecycle
* Also if Java Broker finds logback is already configured (with at least one appender) do not adjust the root logging level
* Make test logback.xml shutdown the logback after test run is complete
* In tests, use FINALIZE_SESSION_MARKER to have the sift subappender closed in a timely fashion
